articles.title: Former Gov. Charlie Baker’s father dies at 97
articles.description:
The former governor has called his father his No. 1 adviser throughout his career.

The post Former Gov. Charlie Baker’s father dies at 97 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former Governor Charlie Baker's father passed away at 97 on November 3, 2025.
Charlie Baker credited his father as his No. 1 adviser throughout his political career.
Baker's loss may impact local political dynamics as he reflects on his father's influence.

articles.title: A Worcester woman has been missing since leaving work Friday morning
articles.description:
Joanna Brown, 30, works at the Bean Counter Bakery Cafe on Grove Street.

The post A Worcester woman has been missing since leaving work Friday morning appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Joanna Brown, 30, has been missing since leaving Bean Counter Bakery Cafe on November 3.
Brown was last seen Friday morning at her workplace on Grove Street in Worcester.
Community members are urged to assist in search efforts for Brown's safe return.
